title: Tasty Methi ( Fenugreek Leaves ) Chicken Recipe
content:
A super fragrant and tasty chicken dish made using methi leaves. This chicken dish tastes great with rice, roti, phulka as well.

When I was looking for dinner inspiration online, I came across a picture of a spicy chicken curry served with some naan. I got so inspired by that so I made it almost immediately.

This chicken dish is so easy to make, you don't need coconut or any other kinds of stuff. If you use larger chicken pieces then it will be tastier. I used small cut chicken because of what I had on hand.

 

Methi Chicken Recipe - Fenugreek Leaves Chicken Curry Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 30 mins

Total time: 40 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

Oil - 4 tablespoons

Shahi Jeera - 1 teaspoon

Onion - 2 large chopped finely

Ginger Garlic Paste - 1 tablespoon

Green Chilli - 2 slit

Tomato - 3 pureed

Chicken - 500 grams

Chilli powder - 2 teaspoons

Kashmiri Chilli Powder - 1 tablespoon

Turmeric Powder - 1 teaspoon

Cumin Powder - 1 teaspoon

Coriander Powder - 2 teaspoon

Garam Masala Powder - 1 teaspoon

Kasuri Methi Leaves - ½ cup

Yogurt - ½ cup

Coriander leaves a handful chopped finely

Salt to taste

 

Instructions

Heat oil in a pan, add shahi jeera.

Add onions and cook till golden brown.

Add in ginger garlic paste and chilies. Saute for a min.

Add in the tomato puree and cook till oil separates.

Add in chicken and stir well

Add in salt and spice powders and mix well.

Add water and cook chicken for 15 to 20 mins.

Now add in whisked yogurt and mix well.

Simmer for 10 mins.

Add in methi leaves and mix well.

Add in garam masala powder and coriander leaves and mix well.

Serve it.

recommendations.title: Chicken Omelette ( Leftover Chicken ) Recipes
recommendations.content:
Healthy chicken omelette which is not only delicious but is very easy to make. You can serve it with rice or enjoy on its own.

recommendations.title: Tasty Udon Chicken Noodles Soup Recipe
recommendations.content:
Delicious hot and sour chicken soup with those thick udon noodles. It is so filling and is so delicious too. You can enjoy this soup on cold days.
 
Udon Chicken Noodles Soup Recipe
Prep time: 10 mins
Cook time: 15 mins
Total time: 25 mins

recommendations.title: Tasty Sesame Chicken Noodles Recipe
recommendations.content:
Delicious chicken noodles made with a touch of sesame flavor. It tastes so delicious and is so fast to make as well.
 
Sesame Chicken Noodles Recipe

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
You
